articles.author: Isaiah Colbert
articles.title: Capcom Is 'Aware' of Dragon's Dogma 2 Frame Rate Issues on PC, Looking Into Fixes - IGN
articles.description: In a statement to IGN, Capcom acknowledged possible frame rate issues with Dragon's Dogma 2 on PC, saying they may be linked to the heavy amount of CPU demanded from NPCs in the game.
articles.content: Folks teeming with excitement to finally dive into Capcom's hotly anticipated fantasy action role-playing sequel Dragon's Dogma 2 on March 12 may experience some inconsistent frame rate performance i… [+4198 chars]

articles.title: Blastoff! SpaceX launches Starlink batch from Califonia at dusk, nails landing - VideoFromSpace
